public interface DatabaseService

Database service interface.

Method Detail

dbConnection

DBConnection dbConnection(String url,
                          String user,
                          String pass)
                          throws SQLException
Gets a DBConnection for the provided URL, username, and password.

Parameters:
url - JDBC URL, in protocol:driver/connectivity mechanism:database identification format
user - Username
pass - Password
Returns:
DBConnection
Throws:
SQLException - Thrown if a database access error occurs
UnsupportedOperationException - Thrown if the database type could not be determined

update

void update(DBConnection dbc,
            String sql)
            throws SQLException
Creates a statement and executes the SQL.

Parameters:
dbc - DBConnection
sql - SQL string
Throws:
SQLException - Thrown if a database error occurs or the provided SQL produces a ResultSet

validConnection

boolean validConnection(String url,
                        String user,
                        String pass)
                        throws DBConnectionFailure
Returns true if the connection to the provided URL succeeds, false otherwise.

Parameters:
url - JDBC URL, in protocol:driver/connectivity mechanism:database identification format
user - Username
pass - Password
Returns:
boolean true on success, false otherwise
Throws:
DBConnectionFailure - Thrown if a database error occurs connecting to the specified database
